org.drombler.acp.core.data

Class AbstractDocumentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drombler.acp.core.data.AbstractDataHandler<Path>
      • org.drombler.acp.core.data.AbstractDocumentHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, LocalContextProvider, DataHandler<Path>, org.softsmithy.lib.util.UniqueKeyProvider<Path>

    public abstract class AbstractDocumentHandler
extends AbstractDataHandler<Path>
    An abstract Path-based DocumentHandler. It observes registered DataCapabilityProviders and adds the found data capabilities to it's local context. You can use this class as a base class for your own document handler implementations.
    Author:
    puce

      • saveNew

        public boolean saveNew(String initialFileName)
                throws IOException
        Saves the content to a file selected from the saveNew dialog. If a file has been selected, the path is set to the selected file.
        Parameters:
        initialFileName - the initial file name
        Returns:
        true, if a file has been selected and saved, else false
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        save()
